item.title: Welcome to past Frabjous Times readers
item.description:
I have moved my creative blogging over to this blog, as you can see, with its fancy new Web 2.0 features. (Integrated comments, for instance.) I hope you’ll like it.

I’ll keep the past archives online at the original site – see the sidebar here if there is something you’d like to check out from the past four years or so.

At the same time, you’ll notice that I’m starting a brand new Wordpress-hosted blog at this time as well \”Worlds in the Uppper Right Hand Corner,\” which will focus on my collection of maps on postage stamps.
